alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Towns; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Towns, Union and southeastern Fannin Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Jones Creek, or 8 miles southwest of Blairsville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hiawassee, Blairsville, Young Harris, Suches, Margret, Brasstown Bald, Gumlog, Ivy Log, Jones Creek, Woods Hole Shelter, Owltown, Vogel State Park, Track Rock, Blood Mountain Shelter, Alexanders Mill, and Gaddistown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
